title: Question: Heavy model run on AMD processors

content.raw:
https://www.amd.com/en/products/cpu/amd-ryzen-threadripper-3990x

Hi anyone got a chance to run gazebo on this or similar processors??

Also heavy model for me can be complete physics enables mobile robot with 2 multi parent sock absorbers. Four casters and a central lift.
